scripts.start: echo Starting App... ğŸ”‹ && electron-forge start
scripts.make: echo Creating Installer... ğŸ’» && electron-forge make
scripts.clean: echo Removing files... ğŸ«§ && rm -rf .vite && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf out && echo All clean now!
scripts.setup: echo Installing dependencies... ğŸ› ï¸ && npm install
scripts.build: npm run check-node-folder && npm run make
scripts.test: npm run check-node-folder && echo Running unit tests... ğŸ§ª && npx vitest test/unit
scripts.test:component: npm run check-node-folder && echo Running component tests... ğŸ§ª && npx vitest test/component
scripts.test:e2e: npm run check-out-folder && echo Running e2e tests ğŸ§ª && npx wdio
scripts.test:all: echo Running all tests... ğŸ§ª && npm run check-out-folder && echo Running unit tests... ğŸ§ª && npx vitest test/unit --run && echo Running component tests... ğŸ§ª && npx vitest test/component --run && echo Running e2e tests ğŸ§ª && npx wdio
scripts.check-out-folder: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = './out'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { console.log('Electron app detected!'); } else { console.log('Electron app not detected, proceeding with build'); require('child_process').execSync('npm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
scripts.check-node-folder: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = './node_modules'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { console.log('All dependencies installed!'); } else { console.log('No dependencies found'); require('child_process').execSync('npm run setup', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
